def_cn: (用于疑问句)什么时候，何时
def_en: You use when to ask questions about the time at which things happen.

def_cn: (表示两事同时发生)在…时，当…时
def_en: If something happens when something else is happening, the two things are happening at the same time.

def_cn: (引导从句，表示某事发生于另一活动、事件或情形期间)在…的过程中
def_en: You use when to introduce a clause in which you mention something which happens at some point during an activity, event, or situation.

def_cn: (引导从句，说明主句动作已经发生或将要发生时的情况)其时
def_en: You use when to introduce a clause where you mention the circumstances under which the event in the main clause happened or will happen.

def_cn: (尤用于动词和形容词后引导从句，表示某事发生的时间)什么时候,何时
def_en: You use when after certain words, especially verbs and adjectives, to introduce a clause where you mention the time at which something happens.

def_cn: (用于引导从句，限定或指示某事发生的时间)…的时候
def_en: You use when to introduce a clause which specifies or refers to the time at which something happens.

def_cn: (用于引出某个观点、评论或问题的原因)既然，考虑到
def_en: You use when to introduce the reason for an opinion, comment, or question.

def_cn: (用于引出使句子的其他部分显得让人吃惊或不大可能的事实或评论)虽然，然而,可是
def_en: You use when in order to introduce a fact or comment which makes the other part of the sentence rather surprising or unlikely.
